statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -1 \\ 16 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ 12 \\ -38 \\ -16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 18 \\ -2 \\ 6 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
